string.name: name
string.value: Tae Gong's Love For His Wife
I should go visit Tae Gong, who's gone fishing floating around in the middle of Aqua Road.

Tae Gong, who's in the middle of the ocean fishing on a raft, was concerned that he couldn't gather up #t4000166# for his wife. I made a deal with him to gather up #b20 #t4000166#s#k for him and deliver them to his wife #bGrandma Yeon#k at the Korean Folk Town.\n\n#t4000166# #b#c4000166##k/20

Tae Gong, who was busy fishing in the middle of the ocean, requested that I gather up 20 #t4000166#s and deliver them to his wife Grandma Yeon, which I did. Grandma Yeon was very thankful, yet sorry that I had to go through all kinds of trouble just for her.
허허... 망망대해 한 가운데서 만나니 더 반갑군. 낚시 좋아하나? 난 매일 여기 나와 낚시를 하는 것이 참 좋다네. 그런데 내 아내는 별로 좋아하지 않아. 내가 바다로 나오고 나면 심심하다나... 그래서 오늘은 아내에게 줄 선물을 준비했으면 하는데 젊은이가 좀 도와주지 않겠나?
아내는 젊었을 때부터 새우를 참 좋아했어. 아마 오늘 새우를 잔뜩 잡아서 #t4000166#을 가져가면 엄청 좋아할 거야. 그런데 이 위에서는 새우를 잡을 수가 없어 새우들은 수면 근처로 올라오지 않고 바닥에서만 사는데다가 더 깊은 바다에 가야 하지. 자네가 내 대신 #t4000166# 20개를 좀 구해서 아랫마을에 사는 내 아내에게 가져다 주게.
아내가 기뻐하는 모습을 보고싶었는데... 노인의 부탁들 거절하다니 너무 하는군.

Ohh ... It's always a welcome sight whenever I run into someone in the middle of nowhere like this. Do you like fishing? I love fishing, and I come out here every morning to fish as much as I can. I don't think my wife likes me leaving the house for too long, though. She told me she's always alone, bored at home. That's why, I've been planning a surprise present for her. Can you help me out here?

My wife has been a big fan of shrimp for a long time, and I think she'll like it a lot if I catch a whole lot of shrimp today and bring her #t4000166#. The problem is, I can't catch shrimp up here; they only reside at the bottom of the ocean, and a deeper one than this one.

I would appreciate it if you can gather up #b20 #t4000166#s#k for me and give them to my wife, who's at the Korean Folk Town. Of course, you'll have to tell her it's from me, okay? She should be at the Folk Town; look for #bGrandma Yeon#k.
I can't believe you said no to an old man like me. All I wanted to do was to make my wife happy...
Who is this? Hey, isn't that shrimp? What, my husband sent this for me? Oh no ... he made you work. He could have brought them here himself... anyway, thank you for bringing them here.

I make pots here for the townspeople here, free of charge. Normally I do not make them for anyone outside this town, but since you have done our family a huge favor by carrying all that shrimp my husband asked you to bring, I'll gladly make a pot for you, if you wish to come back later. You may not be from this town, but I really appreciate your kindness. I'll see you around~
How can I help you? Oh, you must be an outsider... there's nothing to see here, so please go somewhere else.
